alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 03 at 9:34AM CST until March 06 at 1:30PM CST by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in St Louis MO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Missouri... Meramec River near Sullivan. Meramec River near Steelville. Big River at Byrnesville. Bourbeuse River at Union. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 48 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Meramec River near Steelville. * WHEN...From this evening to early Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Near this height, roads to the Lucky Clover campgrounds begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CST Friday the stage was 3.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 14.9 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7:00 am) Location Stg Stage Sat Sun Mon Tue Wed Meramec River Steelville 12.0 3.4 14.9 12.5 6.8 4.6 3.7 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Rainfall heavier than forecast could cause river levels to rise even higher than predicted. The National Weather Service will monitor this developing situation and issue follow up statements as conditions change. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
